name: npc_dota_hero_necrolyte
bio_loc: In a time of great plague, an obscure monk of dark inclinations, one Rotund'jere, found himself promoted to the rank of Cardinal by the swift death of all his superiors. While others of the order went out to succor the ill, the newly ordained cardinal secluded himself within the Cathedral of Rumusque, busily scheming to acquire the property of dying nobles, promising them spiritual rewards if they signed over their terrestrial domains. As the plague receded to a few stubborn pockets, his behavior came to the attention of the greater order, which found him guilty of heresy and sentenced him to serve in the plague ward, ensorcelled with spells that would ensure him a slow and lingering illness. But they had not counted on his natural immunity. Rotund'jere caught the pox, but instead of dying, found it feeding his power, transforming him into a veritable plague-mage, a Pope of Pestilence. Proclaiming himself Necrophos, he travels the world, spreading plague wherever he goes, and growing in terrible power with every village his pestilential presence obliterates.
hype_loc: Wherever Necrophos goes, enemies wither as allies thrive. Restoring health to his friends and harming enemies with each death pulse, once his very presence has eaten away at an enemy, he summons the reaper to lengthen their stay in the afterlife.
npe_desc_loc: Damages enemies and heals allies simultaneously

facets.description_loc: Sadist also grants Necrophos' AoE abilities and items bonus Radius per kill.
facets.name: necrolyte_profane_potency

facets.description_loc: Ghost Shroud steals speed from his enemies.
facets.name: necrolyte_rapid_decay

abilities.name: necrolyte_death_pulse
abilities.desc_loc: Necrophos releases a wave of death around him, dealing damage to enemy units and healing allied units.
abilities.lore_loc: Poor souls who succumb to Rotund'jere's plagues are recycled for future use.

abilities.name: necrolyte_ghost_shroud
abilities.desc_loc: Necrophos slips into the realm that separates the living from the dead. Unable to attack or be attacked, he emits an aura that slows enemies around him. He takes additional magic damage in this form, but his restorative powers are amplified.
abilities.lore_loc: Rotund'jere uses the souls of his victims as bridge from life to afterlife.
facets_loc: Necrophos gains movement speed equal to %movement_transfer%%% of movement speed lost by enemies.

abilities.name: necrolyte_heartstopper_aura
abilities.desc_loc: Necrophos stills the hearts of his opponents, causing nearby enemy units to lose a percentage of their max health over time.
abilities.lore_loc: Those who come within a short distance of Necrophos can feel pestilence and plague in the air.
notes_loc: Damage won't disable items like Blink Dagger.
abilities.scepter_loc: Heartstopper Aura's Health Decay is increased by %heal_regen_to_damage%%% of Necrophos's current health regeneration.

abilities.name: necrolyte_death_seeker
abilities.desc_loc: Necrophos turns into a large Death Pulse towards the target unit's position. Once it arrives to the location, the Death Pulse spreads towards nearby enemies and allies.

abilities.name: necrolyte_sadist
abilities.desc_loc: Necrophos gains stacking regen for %regen_duration% seconds for each unit he kills. Hero kills multiply the effect.
notes_loc: Break disables the gaining of new stacks.
Break does not disable the bonuses from existing stacks.
facets_loc: Sadist also grants Necrophos' AoE abilities and items bonus Radius per kill.

abilities.name: necrolyte_reapers_scythe
abilities.desc_loc: Stuns the target enemy hero, then deals damage based on how much life it is missing. If Necrophos kills an enemy this way, he'll permanently gain Health and Mana Regen. Any kill under this effect is credited to Necrophos.
abilities.lore_loc: The amount of death and suffering in the air increases the power of Necrophos's plague magic.
notes_loc: Damage is dealt at the end of the stun.
